item.title: Retrospective 2022
item.description: ðŸ’­ Is this technical? No. If you are looking for CTF writeups, this is not what you are interested. Instead, this is just me talking on my 2022. 2022 is a life-changer for me. There were some tough decisions and a few surprises. Leaving Hong Kong The #1 difference for me is I moved from Hong Kong ðŸ‡­ðŸ‡° to Taiwan ðŸ‡¹ðŸ‡¼. The most obvious reason is to commence my new career at Google, which I think was an opportunity as well.
